sentences.english: Friends of the museum were permitted to buy pieces that were de-accessioned.
sentences.chinese: 館友們也被容許購買博物館出售的館藏。

sentences.english: In the hall, the shallow challenger shall be allowed to swallow the swallows.
sentences.chinese: 在大廳裏，浮淺得挑釁者將被容許吞下燕子。

sentences.english: China, to beat my old drum, is not going to collapse or implode.
sentences.chinese: 請容許我重申我的意見，中國是不會倒塌或內爆的。

sentences.english: First off, allow us to apologize for the abductions.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請容許咱們爲綁票地球人而表達歉意。

sentences.english: We don't tolerate smoking in the library.
sentences.chinese: 我們不容許在圖書館裏抽菸。

sentences.english: The children should be allowed to go to the movies with friends on Friday nights.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們該當被容許星期五早晨和冤家們一同去看影戲。

sentences.english: A virtual displacements are small displacements, of several different directions permitted by to the constraints.
sentences.chinese: 虛位移是在約束容許的條件下可能發生的。

sentences.english: Without question, if Tirol could be saved by hellos actions.
sentences.chinese: 一沒有疑難問，要是如容許以挽救泰洛的話。

sentences.english: Here let me say that there is no magnificence about this suite of rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在這兒容許我說一下，房間的裝潢絕不富麗堂皇。

sentences.english: And we must not allow the perfect to become the enemy of progress.
sentences.chinese: 我們絕不能容許完美成爲我們進步的敵人。

sentences.english: Allow yourself to weep for things you have lost.
sentences.chinese: 容許你爲自己已經失去的事物而哭泣。

sentences.english: God will permit nothing to hinder what he plans to do.
sentences.chinese: 神絕不會容許受任何事物去攔阻祂的籌算。

sentences.english: Can you even admit that possibility?
sentences.chinese: 你能容許這樣的可能麼？

sentences.english: Wooden walkways allow visitors to closely approach the Grand Prismatic Spring.
sentences.chinese: 木製人行道容許遊客更近地接近大稜鏡溫泉。

definition: to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
